body:
Whaaat. Itou Eight: Kokoronokori / The Regret part 4 ?! That's surprising and ending isn't hard as it was in part 3.
Also Itaba Hiroshi doing NTR is something new.
Yo! Kokoronokori part 4??! Oh my.... Oh my... Merry Christmas baby!
whos the girl in the last page?
twas suppose to be one with an actual octopus but I've been tricked

Kokoronokori part 4, I cant get hard anymore, I like itou8 art and does not care about story, because its not make sense at all and so dumb, but I cant get hard anymore recently, I read too much hentai, maybe i get bored or I get influenced by 18+ koreans manhwa. The koreans porn manhwa is so good right now.

Cover Illustration + Pin-up ・ PaNaMa

When i thought kokoronokoro was ended and Itou Eight-sensei bring the ultimate sequel. Woah, such a... darned thing it is.
Oh mashiro doujin have a part2

The author just HAD to give the women a good ending smh Like the husband could’ve just divorced and gone on with his life and she would end up walking her teacher on a wheelchair but NO the husband had to duck himself for life. Kill Yourself Hubby
Kazuhiro, uff...     Itou eight rico, but WHY!!!?...
